title: Jason & tomcc: 改善了动画水导致的卡顿
author: BensonQC
txt_content:
本帖最后由 _Benson_ 于 2016-3-11 22:08 编辑 





Jason & tomcc: 
For those of you who turned off animated water because it made your game lag, that has now been fixed. Coming to some future release.
GPU Accelerated Animated Textures work now, we removed the option entirely because now they're free :)
Yeah, apparently GPU's are good at copying data around. Who knew ;)
Jason & tomcc: 
如果你因为动画水使游戏变得卡顿而关了它，我想告诉你，那已经被修复了。将在未来的更新中加入。
GPU加速动画材质现在运作了，我们完全移除了选项，因为它们现在是免费的 :)
没错，显然GPU善于复制数据。谁知道呢 ;)
